scripts.compile: npm run compile:code && npm run compile:types
scripts.examples:01_counter: npm run compile:code && WAKUWORK_CONFIG='{"devServer":{"dir":"./examples/01_counter"}}' nodemon --ext ts,tsx --ignore ./examples/01_counter/src/Counter.tsx --exec /usr/bin/env ./cli.js dev
